thread.title: Fonon Corporation Announces Inventory for Immediate Release
thread.title_full: Fonon Corporation Announces Inventory for Immediate Release

author: prbuzz.com
title: Fonon Corporation Announces Inventory for Immediate Release
text:
Fonon grows finished goods inventory providing customers with systems for immediate delivery
Lake Mary, Florida, 09 September 2015—Fonon Corporation (‘Fonon’) (OTCBB: FNON) updates finished goods inventory making available the following systems for immediate delivery.
• Titan 5x10 Cutting System
 Click here to view the Titan
• LaserTower Professional system with 30W C0² laser
• LaserTower Professional CM system with 30W Fiber laser
• Canyon Deep-Engraving System with 50W Fiber laser
Click Here for the LaserTower™ Family
In addition, the company has available through its Laser Depot Rental Program
• LaserTower Compact system with 20W Fiber laser
• MarkStar Professional Hand-Held
Click-Here for MarkStar™ Professional Video
For more information, contact Sales at 407-477-5618.
About Fonon Corporation
Fonon Corporation is the recognized leader of industrial-grade 3D Additive and Subtractive laser-based material processing systems. Our systems are used world-wide in the semiconductor, flat panel display, automotive, aerospace, industrial, defense, electronic and medical industries with a portfolio of intellectual property, knowhow & inventions placing our company in the unique position to offer both standard 3D material processing systems or our specialty of tooling 3D laser-based transforming systems designed around the unique applications of our customers.
To learn more about Fonon Corporation, visit: http://fonon.us
